name: MedicationDispense-requestdate
purpose: To select the medication dispense instances based on the requestdate (the time at which a pharmacist records an intended dispense) of the medication.
description: Searches MedicationDispense resources based on the request date (the time at which a pharmacist records an intended dispense), provided in the value of the 'http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/zib-Dispense-RequestDate' extension.
